attributes.review:
Warning 
This app gives you Trumpphobia it has been the worst days of my life . I got nightmares of trump and I always woke up at 3:00 am . And every time I see a picture of trump I get Anxiety . So don’t get this app
attributes.title: Worst app in the world

attributes.review: when i was walking my refrigeration at night when the sun was out my turtle moo’d so i gave it a rocket and then he went on my phone and took out a dino and then the dino told me that this app was terrible and he spoketh truth. thank you good bye.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP😡

attributes.review: This app MADE MY refriGERATOR RUN AWAY. RUN. AWAY. I THOUGHT MY FRIDGE WAS RUN DOWN BUT NO IT RAN AWAY. AND I GOT A CALL FROM SOMEONE AND THEY SAID “is your refrigerator running” AND I SAID “YES ITS RUNNING AWAY”. THEY HUNG UP. I had to call the electrician!! The electrician had no idea what to do because my fridge escaped. It took my food too. I’m starving. Please. Do not download this app. Please.
attributes.title: BE CAREFUL

attributes.review: This app glitches out as soon as I went on it and my WiFi and signal was fine. It had also said really horrible things about people. IF you’re thinking about getting this app DO NOT GET IT!!!
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!

attributes.review: Every time I opened the app it would display an error message saying “ 𝔁𝓾𝓮🥶𝓱𝓾𝓪🧚‍♀️𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸😻𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸🗿𝓫𝓮𝓲👺𝓯𝓮𝓷𝓰🤩𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸😼𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸👣”.  It sent me so many push notifications that my phone overheated and it fried the battery. Very disappointed and disgusted.
attributes.title: SPAM!

attributes.review: This app was made by monkeys who have been hit in the head repeatedly their whole lives. It broke my phone and caused it to turn off for 3 days!!!!! Who in their right mind would download this? it’s a virus. stay away!
attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: i downloaded this app and it ruined my life. this app gave me chlymydia so my wife left me. every single time i opened the app i would be bombarded with videos of people being murdered! this app killed my dog and cut out my right eye and ate it. very bad:(
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: As Mark Twain once said, “don’t argue with stupid people.  They’ll drag you down to their level and beat you with experience.”
attributes.title: horrible don’t waste your time and money on this w

attributes.review: This app leaked my location which led to my dog being stolen. Some old tRUmPeR found out I was MeXiCan and took my old pupper. The guy also took my fridge... I guess I’ll never see my goldfish snacks anymore. Never again will I use such an atrocious app. NUNCA!!!!👺👺
attributes.title: FEROCIOUS 🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review: I am just......scared😔 a child accidentally downloaded this and when they first opened the app there is a scary man that that made them cry. Do not recommend for children🙅‍♀️ nglie it scares me to so do not recommend for teens😥✨🤮
attributes.title: Im never gonna be the same😣
